org.hkijena.jipipe.api.history

Interface JIPipeHistoryJournal

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JIPipeDedicatedGraphHistoryJournal, JIPipeDummyGraphHistoryJournal, JIPipeProjectHistoryJournal

    public interface JIPipeHistoryJournal
    Base class for all journals that track the history of projects or graphs

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  JIPipeHistoryJournal.ChangedEvent
      Event when the history log was changed

      • snapshot

        void snapshot(String name,
              String description,
              UUID compartment,
              Icon icon)
        Creates a new snapshot in the history journal
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the snapshot
        description - the description of the snapshot
        compartment - the compartment. can be null.
        icon - an icon. can be null.

      • getSnapshots

        List<JIPipeHistoryJournalSnapshot> getSnapshots()
        Gets the list of all snapshots. The higher the index, the newer the snapshot.
        Returns:
        the list of snapshots
